content.raw:
weird I can't reproduce it locally. The test failure suggests that the NewImageFrame events were never fired after setting up connection `c` the second time. The only difference  I can see between gazebo7 and 8 is that we're disconnecting the `ConnectNewImageFrame` event by resetting the `c` pointer instead of using the depcrecated Disconnect function call.

I'll probably have to do some debugging with printouts on jenkins
content.html:
weird I can't reproduce it locally. The test failure suggests that the NewImageFrame events were never fired after setting up connection c the second time. The only difference I can see between gazebo7 and 8 is that we're disconnecting the ConnectNewImageFrame event by resetting the c pointer instead of using the depcrecated Disconnect function call.

I'll probably have to do some debugging with printouts on jenkins
